outputs.output_descr: By promoting the conservation of Armenia's PA system, the project will be helping to protect part of WWF's "Global 200" and Conservation International's "Caucasus Hotspot" at an area of 137,000 ha. Expected outcomes of the project include: long-term financial sustainability of the majority of the PA system in Armenia (at least 300,000 ha) secured through the operation of the Caucasus Protected Areas Fund (CPAF), raised cost-effectiveness of site management by at least 25% on at least 10 PAs, etc.

project_descr: The purpose of the Project Preparation Grant (PPG) is to develop for GEF submission and approval the project document for receiving the FSP. The project should be prepared in line with GEF requirements.
project_title: GEF 4258 BD MSP: Catalyzing Fin. Sust. PAs
